directions: Blend cottage cheese, lemon juice, and water in a blender, scraping down sides occasionally, until very smooth, about 2 minutes. Stir in parsley, chives, salt, and pepper.
Chill spread, covered, about 1 hour (for flavors to develop).
ingredients: Accompaniment: 1/2 pound multigrain bread, cut into 4 slices and lightly toasted
title: Herbed Cottage Cheese with Multigrain Bread
